message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 400k, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of rejecting your first offer!
You rejected my first offer, now it's time for you to give a bit more!
You're pushing me to give more, but I'm not going to give up yet! I'll meet you in the middle, but that's as high as I'll go!
You said you wouldn't give up, but I'm not backing down either! I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give in completely.
You're not budging, and neither am I. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give in completely either!
You're getting closer, but I'm not done yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, but that's as far as I'll go.
